system.description: When you make a Circle move, make a city move, trigger an intimacy move, cash in a Debt or honor a Debt, lend a hand or get in the way, mark the Circle involved.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: The MC tells you what interesting thing happens.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value: When you've marked all four Circles, erase the marks and advance.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value: When you've marked all four Circles, erase the marks and advance.
